title: How to Eject a Flash Drive from a Mac

steps.title: Empty the trash.
steps.content: Empty the trash. Files in the trash from the flash drive will prevent it being ejected.

steps.title: Under Devices, find your flash drive listed.
steps.content: Under Devices, find your flash drive listed.

steps.title: Wait until the light on your flash drive stops flashing.
steps.content: Wait until the light on your flash drive stops flashing.

steps.title: Empty the trash.
steps.content: Empty the trash. Files in the trash from the flash drive will prevent it being ejected.

steps.title: Under Devices, find your flash drive listed.
